issues.description: The homepage is missing a title tag. This is critical for SEO as the title appears in search results.
issues.recommendation: Add a metadata export with a descriptive title (50-60 characters) that includes your primary keyword.

issues.description: The homepage is missing a meta description. This text appears in search result snippets.
issues.recommendation: Add a compelling meta description (150-155 characters) that summarizes the page content and includes a call to action.

issues.description: The services page is missing a meta description.
issues.recommendation: Add a meta description that highlights your main service offerings.

issues.description: No sitemap.xml found in the project. A sitemap helps search engines discover and index your pages.
issues.recommendation: Generate and add a sitemap.xml file to your public directory. Include all important pages with appropriate priority and change frequency.

issues.description: No robots.txt found. This file controls how search engines crawl your site.
issues.recommendation: Add a robots.txt file that allows crawling of public pages and links to your sitemap.

issues.description: The homepage has no Open Graph image configured. OG images appear when the page is shared on social media.
issues.recommendation: Add an og:image meta tag with a 1200x630 pixel image for optimal social sharing appearance.

issues.description: The services page has no Open Graph image.
issues.recommendation: Create and add a custom OG image that represents your services.

issues.description: No Organization or WebSite schema markup found. Structured data helps search engines understand your content.
issues.recommendation: Add JSON-LD schema markup for Organization and WebSite to your root layout.

issues.description: The blog listing page has only 100 words. Search engines may consider this thin content.
issues.recommendation: Add more content to the page, such as a description of your blog topics, featured posts, or category navigation.

issues.description: The blog page has no internal links pointing to it from other pages.
issues.recommendation: Add links to the blog from your homepage, navigation, or other relevant pages to improve discoverability.
